description.value:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have a hand free.

You always have a special batch of preserved liquor ready for each day. You serve your liquor to a willing adjacent creature. The creature recovers @Damage[(2*@actor.level)[healing]]{Hit Points equal to twice your level}. Additionally, for 1 hour, all Diplomacy checks to influence the creature gain a +1 status bonus.
